dcterms:description: CIC-IDS-2017 contains most common cyber attacks, including bruteforcing, heartbleed, botnet, (D)DoS, Infiltration, and Web attacks. Traces were collected in a LAN, with benign traffic generated by proÔ¨Åling normal online behaviors of 25 users on different OSs.
dcterms:title: CIC-IDS-2017

dcterms:description: CSE-CIC-IDS2018 was generated in a larger environment with an organizational LAN simulating different departments. It contains a wider range of benign traffic and a larger attack collection (17 types).
dcterms:title: CSE-CIC-IDS2018

dcterms:description: CSE-CIC-IDS2018 (merged dataset) includes self-collected traffic to mitigate erroneous data in the original dataset, ensuring a more accurate representation of network attacks.
dcterms:title: CSE-CIC-IDS2018 (merged dataset)
